text: @mattgaetz You are more stupid than you look. 128,788 dead from covid19 at least. CDC say could be 10 times that as homes for elderly & home deaths not included, just hospitals. That’s why ppl are & should be in lockdown, instead of dying bc ppl like you spread it. Trump incapable.
